system.description:
Observation enables you to notice details, spot hidden threats, or detect clues in your surroundings.

You make an Observation test to passively notice details or actively search for hidden dangers or valuable information. If multiple characters are involved in searching, you can transfer successes to aid others in their observations.

Extra Successes Can Be Used To:

  • Spot Hidden Threats – Identify concealed enemies or traps.
  • Detect Clues – Uncover hidden or subtle hints that others might miss.
  • Analyze Environment – Assess environmental hazards or advantageous features.
  • Read Situations – Gauge the mood or intentions of individuals through subtle cues.
  • Track Movements – Follow trails or footprints left by creatures or people.
  • Identify Patterns – Recognize recurring motifs or sequences in your surroundings.
